## Type of Feedback

Please select one:
- [ ] General feedback on using Promps
- [ ] Question about how something works
- [ ] Discussion / Idea (not a formal feature request)
- [ ] Documentation improvement suggestion
- [ ] Other

## Your Feedback

Please share your thoughts, questions, or suggestions here.

**Free format - no specific structure required!**

---

**For Testers**: Your general feedback about the user experience, what's working well, and what could be improved is very valuable. Don't hesitate to share your thoughts!
